update(ResponseInput) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Controller.Controller
this method is used to take the response of the different query to the virtual view
update(ResponseInput) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.NetworkHandlerRMI
Method used by private view to ask at the network handler to send a message of ResponseInput The method saves the message in his buffer and after this message will take by server using the method "getResponseMessage"
update(ResponseInput) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.NetworkHandlerSocket
Method used by private view to ask at the network handler to send a message of ResponseInput It uses the method sendMessageNet.
update(T) - Method in interface it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.Observer
Method that takes in input the message of update from observable object and handle the updating of this observer object
update(RequestInput) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.PrivateView
This method being used by network handler to save the message of request input that is arrived now from server with a notify.
update(UpdateModel) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.View
If there were changes in the model the controller use this method to send the model updated at all player active The method continues to send the message until the client doesn't respond with a message of correct reception About the connections that are no active the message will not send
UpdateModel - Class in it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.communication_message.update_model
This class is a container that contains a copy immutable of all the model It will be send at the private view and being used by CLI or GUI
UpdateModel(GameBoard) - Constructor for class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.communication_message.update_model.UpdateModel

updateModel(UpdateModel) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.NetworkHandlerRMI

updateModel(UpdateModel) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.NetworkHandlerSocket

updateModelCopy(UpdateModel) - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.View.PrivateView
Thi method being called by Network Handler to ask at view to update its copy of the model to show at the user , after shows the game board updated and send at the controller a message to say that the model was update with success
updatePlayerRoomList() - Method in class it.polimi.deib.se2018.adrenalina.Model.Room
